arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. RB Leipzig preview: Hoffenheim look for second home win against in-form Leipzig
arts.sum: Hoffenheim are searching for their second home win of the season as they welcome RB Leipzig to Sinsheim.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
